summary.para: Indicates what kind of content the subpicture stream contains.

remarks.para: Most subpicture streams contain language-related content such as movie subtitles, but subpictures can also be used for the bouncing ball in karaoke or other non-language-related purposes.

summary.para: Indicates that the subpicture uses run length encoding.
Indicates that subpicture uses extended encoding.
Indicates that the subpicture uses some other encoding scheme.
